tracks.title: Bittersweet Echoes
tracks.description: A nostalgic and evocative piece where strings build into a powerful, emotional swell alongside the piano.

tracks.title: Echoes of Silence
tracks.description: An atmospheric blend of delicate piano and lush orchestral textures that creates a sense of profound stillness, like watching moonlight reflect on a quiet stream.

tracks.title: Starlit Dreams
tracks.description: A peaceful and gentle journey through the stars that feels like floating through a clear night sky.

tracks.title: The Hidden Path
tracks.description: A melodic and mystical journey that feels like exploring the secrets of a sun-dappled forest.

tracks.title: The Mossy Gateway
tracks.description: A hauntingly beautiful and mysterious track that feels like stepping through an ancient, forgotten portal.
